item.title: 2025 January: Angel Island Backpacking
item.description:
Day 1

  • Meet at Caltrain station 7am (NOT CHURCH)
  • Take the 7:42am train
  • Arrive at San Francisco Caltrain Station (Address: 700 4th St, San Francisco, CA 94107)
  • Head to Ferry Building (Address: 1 Ferry Building, San Francisco, CA 94105)
  • Walk to Ferry Building (~30 min/1.6 miles)
  • Buy round trip tickets to and from Angel Island
  • Take the 10:15 AM Ferry to Angel Island
  • Lunch (on island)
  • Visit museum before close at 2:30
  • Hike to Garrison Group Campsite( ~1 mile/ ~30min)
  • Setup tent
  • Dinner
  • Campfire Activities/Night Games - Led by Kaden and potentially others

Day 2

  • Wake up 7am
  • Early breakfast/cleanup
  • Take the 10:55 AM Ferry to SF Ferry Building
  • Walk back to Caltrain

item.title: 2024 December: San Francisco Hostel Outing
item.description:
Itinerary:

  • Hostel
  • Lombard Street
  • Fortune Cookie Factory
  • Cable Car Museum
  • Sue Bierman Park for lunch
  • Coit tower
  • Ghiradelli Square
  • Hostel

item.title: 2024 November: Tomales Bay Kayak Camping
item.description:
Day 1:

  • Head to Heart’s Desire Beach
  • Rent kayaks from Blue Water Kayaking
  • Paddle to the Marshall Beach Group Boat-Only campsite
  • Lunch, Setup Tent, Activity etc, spend the night at campsite

Day 2:

  • Paddle back to Heart’s Desire Beach
  • Return kayaks
  • Lunch?
  • Head home

item.title: 2024 September: Point Reyes Backpacking
item.description:
Day 1:

  • Arrive at trailhead, Unload all gear, drivers with cars go down to Limantour Beach Parking, (eat dinner)
  • Drivers come back in one car, park at trailhead
  • Start hiking to sky camp
  • Setup camp and go to sleep

Day 2:

  • Wakeup, breakfast
  • Pack up camp, start hiking to Coast camp
  • Set bags down, walk down to Secret beach
  • Arrive back at camp for dinner
  • Night game and campfire
  • Quiet time

Day 3:
